web.title: Inacash
web.desc: Developing a landing page for the inacash.com website. Inacash is an electronic payment platform that can be used by users to carry out various kinds of transactions. Click <a href="https://inacash.com/" target="_blank" >here</a > to check the web.

web.title: Monstero Atelier
web.desc: Monstero is a convection company. This website was built to make it easier for customers to get information, and invite cooperation with Monstero Convection. Click <a href="https://monstero-atelier.co.id/" target="_blank" >here</a > to check the web.

web.title: Bikersdream
web.desc: Bikersdream is one of the most complete online stores that sells driver equipment. Helps facilitate the community in finding information related to products offered by Bikersdream. Click here to check the web.

web.title: Forum Asisten Amikom Purwokerto
web.desc: Organization website that I developed when I was still in college. I built this website using native PHP. Click here to check the web.

web.title: Himpunan Mahasiswa Islam Purwokerto
web.desc: The website of the management organization of the Purwokerto branch of the Islamic student association. Click here to check the web.

mobile.title: Baca Aja: Agregator Berita
mobile.desc: This is an application that I developed myself using Flutter. This application is a collection of news from various media so that application users can read lots of news in various media in one application.

mobile.title: FlipFlopTV
mobile.desc: Develop applications using flutter. Create an online streaming service (FlipFlopTV) application to offer a variety of interesting entertainment shows such as movies, talk shows, documentaries, which can be enjoyed with internet-based devices

mobile.title: Wisata Niaga Hotel
mobile.desc: Wisata Niaga is one of the hotels located in Purwokerto. This application helps people to make hotel reservations easier online. thereby speeding up the customer reservation process.

mobile.title: PIXEL IPTV
mobile.desc: Mobile application for hotel guest room visitors. provide entertainment and information about the hotel

mobile.title: My Golf Statistic
mobile.desc: This is an application that me and my teams developed using Flutter. This apps are used for entering golf tournaments.

mobile.title: Hijrah Nuswantara
mobile.desc: The Hijrah Nuswantara application is a donation-raising application that specializes in helping the houses of Allah throughout the country, from the nearest mosque to mosques that are far from your reach.

mobile.title: Hijrah Masjid
mobile.desc: Hijrah Masjid wants to invite mosque administrators throughout Indonesia to register their mosques as digital mosques which will have a positive effect on the continuity of mosques.

mobile.title: JDIH BAPPENAS
mobile.desc: Help develop the JDIH BAPPENAS application. This application helps provide information, making it easier for people to get the latest information regarding JDIH BAPPENAS

mobile.title: Inacash
mobile.desc: One of the first Indonesian e-money applications in Indonesia that uses blockchain technology.
